response.explain: Since there is no previous action code or execution error, we are starting from scratch. The task is to cook ham hocks in a stockpot. The ham hocks are currently inside the fridge and the stockpot is on top of the oven. The oven and fridge are both closed. The first step is to open the fridge to get the ham hocks.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the ham hocks out of the fridge
(3) Put the ham hocks into the stockpot
(4) Cook the ham hocks in the stockpot
response.code:
